snippet: The World Trade Organization ruled in favor of the United States in a longstanding dispute over allegations that China unfairly imposed tariffs that restricted American poultry exports.
abstract: World Trade Organization rules in favor of United States in longstanding dispute over allegations that China unfairly imposed tariffs that restricted American poultry exports.
lead_paragraph: The World Trade Organization ruled in favor of the United States in a longstanding dispute over allegations that China unfairly imposed tariffs that restricted American poultry exports.

headline.main: W.T.O. Backs U.S. Appeal on Chicken Tariffs in China
headline.print_headline: W.T.O. Backs U.S. Appeal On Chicken Tariffs In China
